mapper.select: /* 연혁 갯수 조회 */ SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT HSTRY_YR) FROM KB_CO_HSTRY_INFO WHERE 1 = 1

/* 연혁 리스트 조회 */ SELECT HSTRY_YR , HSTRY_LCLSF_SN , HSTRY_LCLSF_TTL , HSTRY_LCLSF_SORT_NO , HSTRY_SCLSF_SN , HSTRY_SCLSF_TTL , HSTRY_SCLSF_SORT_NO , HSTRY_SCLSF_UP_LCLSF_SN , FRST_RGTR , FRST_REG_DT , LAST_MDFR , LAST_MDFCN_DT , ROWNUM ROWNUMBER FROM KB_CO_HSTRY_INFO ORDER BY HSTRY_YR DESC
SELECT MAX(HSTRY_LCLSF_SN) MAX_LCL_SN FROM KB_CO_HSTRY_INFO WHERE 1 = 1 AND HSTRY_YR = #{hstry_yr} GROUP BY HSTRY_YR

/* 연혁 상세 내용 조회 */ SELECT HSTRY_YR , HSTRY_LCLSF_SN , HSTRY_LCLSF_TTL , HSTRY_LCLSF_SORT_NO , HSTRY_SCLSF_SN , HSTRY_SCLSF_TTL , HSTRY_SCLSF_SORT_NO , HSTRY_SCLSF_UP_LCLSF_SN , 'main_input' || HSTRY_LCLSF_SN AS MAIN_ID_NAME , 'sub_input' || HSTRY_LCLSF_SN || '_' || HSTRY_SCLSF_SN AS SUB_ID , 'sub_input' || HSTRY_LCLSF_SN AS SUB_NAME , CASE WHEN LAG(HSTRY_LCLSF_SN) OVER (PARTITION BY HSTRY_LCLSF_SN ORDER BY HSTRY_LCLSF_SN ASC, HSTRY_SCLSF_SN ASC) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE LAG(HSTRY_LCLSF_SN) OVER (PARTITION BY HSTRY_LCLSF_SN ORDER BY HSTRY_LCLSF_SN ASC, HSTRY_SCLSF_SN ASC) END AS DISPLAY_YN , '항목 ' || HSTRY_LCLSF_SN AS H_TITLE , 'main_sn' || HSTRY_LCLSF_SN AS MAIN_SN , 'sub_sn' || HSTRY_SCLSF_SN AS SUB_SN , COUNT(HSTRY_LCLSF_SN) OVER (PARTITION BY HSTRY_LCLSF_SN ORDER BY HSTRY_LCLSF_SN ASC) CNT_OVER FROM KB_CO_HSTRY_INFO WHERE 1 = 1 AND HSTRY_YR = #{hstry_yr} AND HSTRY_LCLSF_SN = ${hstry_lclsf_sn} ORDER BY HSTRY_LCLSF_SN ASC, HSTRY_SCLSF_SN ASC
